name: Steorra Lux
description:
This is my second 'released' Unity3d project. It is a bit of an extension of the official Unity3D Space Shooter tutorial. I actually did some 'art' on this one. 

The game: WASD to move, LMB fires the weapon. 

Credit: The music is a track called 'The Stormbringer'  by Adrian Von Ziegler (@AdrianVZiegler), a Swiss composer that makes some excellent music in a variety of styles.
